about.title: Welcome to Her S spa
about.content_1: HerSspa is a global chain of Mini Home Spas, providing comprehensive and effective solutions for skin care, rejuvenation, and full-body massage therapy.
about.content_2: With devices and products utilizing exclusive ageLOC technology from the United States, capable of directly influencing and reactivating youthful cellular functions, helping to prevent aging at its root.

spa_section.title: How long has it been... SINCE YOU LOVED YOURSELF?
spa_section.description_1: Stress, insomnia, dull skin, premature aging, uncontrolled weight gain...
spa_section.description_2: All of these are signs that your body is crying for help due to accumulated toxins.
spa_section.treatment_intro: Treating yourself to a deep spa treatment is not just a relaxing gift, but also a way to:
benefits: Detoxify the body from deep within
Release stress and nurture positive emotions
Boost immunity and improve overall health
spa_section.highlight_text: When the body is healthy – skin will be radiant – soul will shine!
spa_section.closing_text: Let your youth always be full of energy and radiant beauty.

items.title: RELAX BODY MASSAGE & CIRCULATION THERAPY
benefits: Combining modern science & traditional Eastern medicine

sections.title: Exclusive patented technology and high-quality products from the USA
sections.description: The exclusive ageLOC technology patented in the United States has the ability to directly impact deep within the skin. It helps regenerate cellular vitality, bringing a youthful appearance to women, representing a breakthrough advancement in safe and effective beauty technology. We guarantee authentic product lines.

sections.title: Immediate results from the first experience
sections.description: Treatment combining advanced technology with acupressure therapy to stimulate the lymphatic system throughout the body, helping to rejuvenate the entire skin complexion.

sections.title: Dedicated team of specialists and spa owners
sections.description: We always strive to provide the best and most suitable experience for our customers.
